title: I love  how Riot removes fun items with zero reason behind it
body:
DFG -> Fun sniper-assassin Veig item
http://imgur.com/8QeCUc5 *Nope*

Bulwark -> A good MR/Armor itemization for tanks
http://imgur.com/8QeCUc5 *Nope*

Sparks -> Just fun
http://imgur.com/8QeCUc5 *Nope*

SotD -> Lelel 3 you thought you was safe! {{champion:29}} 
http://imgur.com/8QeCUc5 *Nope*

Executioner's Calling -> Good for killing those {{item:3074}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3072}} - builders when you don't have CC
http://imgur.com/8QeCUc5 *Nope*

Leviathan -> A stacking item for tanks! 
http://imgur.com/8QeCUc5 *Nope*
